sql:
SELECT A.name, COALESCE(SUM(C.citation_count), 0) AS num_citations
FROM Author A
JOIN Author_list AL ON A.author_id = AL.author_id
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT cited_paper_id, COUNT(*) AS citation_count
    FROM Citation
    GROUP BY cited_paper_id
) C ON AL.paper_id = C.cited_paper_id
GROUP BY A.author_id, A.name
ORDER BY num_citations DESC
LIMIT 1;
question: What is the name and number of citations of the author with the greatest number of citations among authors?

sql:
SELECT A.name, COALESCE(COUNT(C.cited_paper_id), 0) AS num_citations
FROM Author A
JOIN Author_list AL ON A.author_id = AL.author_id
LEFT JOIN Citation C ON AL.paper_id = C.cited_paper_id
GROUP BY A.author_id, A.name
ORDER BY num_citations DESC
LIMIT 1;
question: What is the name and number of citations of the author with the greatest number of citations among authors?

sql:
SELECT a.name, COUNT(c.paper_id) AS number_of_citations
FROM Author a
JOIN Author_list al ON a.author_id = al.author_id
JOIN Citation c ON al.paper_id = c.cited_paper_id
GROUP BY a.author_id, a.name
ORDER BY number_of_citations DESC
LIMIT 1;
question: What is the name and number of citations of the author with the greatest number of citations among authors?

sql:
SELECT a.name, COUNT(c.cited_paper_id) AS citation_count
FROM Author a
JOIN Author_list al ON a.author_id = al.author_id
JOIN Citation c ON al.paper_id = c.cited_paper_id
GROUP BY a.author_id, a.name
ORDER BY citation_count DESC
LIMIT 1;
question: What is the name and number of citations of the author with the greatest number of citations among authors?
